{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi kia neke whakarunga (tētahi mea).
tauira: Na ka ekea a Rangi ki runga

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eneene', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kōrero ki tētahi atu i runga i te wairua whakamihi, whakangāwari, i tō hiahia kia whiwhi koe i tētahi mea kei a ia e pupuri ana.
tauira: Kei te eneene kai māna

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'erangi', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu e tohu ana i te taupatupatu o te āhuatanga whai i muri mai ki tētahi atu kei mua e rere ana.
tauira: Kāhore ahau e mea kia kotahi, erangi kia tokomaha atu
Kua tae rawa ia ki te wā e tika ana kia makere mai ia i taua tūranga nō te kaumātuatanga ōna, erangi, kua whakahoua anō

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'emiemi', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kua whakahuihui mai, kua whakahuihuitia mai ki tētahi wāhi.
tauira: Kua emiemi katoa ngā tatauranga o te motu, he mahi nui tā rātou iāianei ki te tātari i ngā kōrero.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I muri i te 'kore', i te 'kāore' me te 'kaua' (tae atu ki ngā kupu taurite), e mahi tahi ana ki aua kupu ki te kawe i te whakakāhoretanga.
tauira: Kore rawa au e whakaae - kei te hē kē tana mahi.
Kāore au e peka atu ki tō Mea rā, kei tūreiti au.
Kaua e whengua tō ihu ki te tāora nā!
Taupokina te huka kia kore ai e muia e te pōpokoriki.
Nā te kohu i kore ai e tau mai te waka rererangi i te hāora tika.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi tahi ki te kupu 'mā' (me ōna āhua maha) ki te āta whakaatu i te tangata, i te hanga rānei ko ia ka mahi i tētahi mahi.
tauira: Māku e horoi ngā wharepaku - māu e tahitahi ngā papa.
Mā Pita koe e whakahoki.
Waiho mā te whakamā a ia e patu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113raka',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tēraka', e tohu ana i ētahi mea e rua, neke atu kāore e tata ana ki te kaikōrero, ki te kaiwhakarongo rānei.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekieki', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Roa noa atu te toro whakarunga, tino tawhiti rānei te noho mai i runga ake i te papa.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka piki ki runga i tētahi mea kia riro ai māna koe e kawe haere ki hea, ki hea.
tauira: He poto rawa koe ki te eke hōiho ki te kore tētahi hei āwhina i a koe.
Ka eke ia i tana pahikara, ka haere ki te toa.
He waka eke noa

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'erepata', 'br.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kararehe whāngote tino kaitā, he kiwikiwi he hākorukoru te kiri, he ihu roa tōna, he rahi, he tīreparepa ōna taringa.
tauira: Ko te ngutu o te erepata he mea rerekē noa atu i tō ētahi atu kurī. Arā, ko tōna ihu he mea tuku kia roa rawa, tae ki te waru putu te roa, ko ngā pongaponga, arā ngā puta ihu, kei te moremorenga, kei te pito

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113n\u0101.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tēnā', e tohu ana i ētahi mea e rua, neke atu, e tata ana ki te kaiwhakarongo.
tauira: Ehara i a koe ēnā hū - nō tō tuakana kē.
He pai ki a au ēnā wāhine e kōrero nā koe.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehara', 'bran.whakam\u0101oritanga: Hei whakakāhore i ngā rerenga tīmata ki te 'nā' me te 'nō', te 'mā' me te 'mō'. I ētahi wā ko taua kupu tonu te mea ka whai i muri mai, he wā anō ka hurihia ki te 'i'.
tauira: Ehara nō Hine te hē - nō tana teina kē.
Ehara māku tēnei reta - māu kē.
Pare: Nā wai i whāki atu? Tū: Ehara i a au.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka taka (te wā, ki te wā rānei).
tauira: Kua eke te hāora me wehe atu te pahi.

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'emiemi', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka raru te ngākau, ka hē te wairua i te mahinga o tētahi mahi hē, i te mōhiotia rānei o tētahi mahi e whakaarotia ana kāore i tika, kāore i pai.
tauira: Kua emiemi a Hine i ngā mahi whānako a tana tungāne.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kua pirau me te kaha haunga anō.
tauira: Kua ero te ika i te roa e whitia ana e te rā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113tehi',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tētahi', e tohu ana i tētahi wāhanga o te katoa, he neke atu i te mea kotahi.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113r\u0101.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te takitini o te kupu 'tērā', e tohu ana i ētahi mea e rua, neke atu kāore e tata ana ki te kaikōrero, ki te kaiwhakarongo rānei.
tauira: Tēnā haria atu ngā koti nei ki ērā e noho mai rā i waho.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eo', 'branch_.whakam\u0101oritanga: He pepeke parirau kore kai toto ka kitea i ngā makawe, i ngā huruhuru rānei o raro.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te wāhi o te tinana wahine, o te tinana whāereere rānei e tipu ai te kukune.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ete', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kukū haere (o te kai e tunua ana).

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e ai ki . . ..whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu whakataki i te whakaaro e whakapuakina ana e te tangata, e tohu ana nō wai ake taua whakaaro.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kāore e nui te kiko, te mōmona rānei i te tinana.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I mua i te kupu pātai 'hia', i mua anō i ngā tau rua ki te iwa, e whakaatu ana i te maha o ētahi mea.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'engaio', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He momo noke 150-200 mirimita te tupu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'epaepa', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka rite tonu te haupatu ki tētahi hanga pērā i te kōhatu, he mea whiu e te ringa.
tauira: He mea epaepa te whare ki te kōhatu, koirā e pakaru katoa nā ngā matapihi.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'epa', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: He mea ka whakaroaroa, ka whakauaua rānei i te neke whakamua o tētahi kaupapa.
tauira: He epa noa iho te hū ki te tamariki; he pai noa ake te haere hū kore.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te ewe me ngā kiriuhi kukune ka peia atu i te kōpū i muri i te whānautanga mai o te pēpē, o te kūao rānei.
tauira: Ka raua atu e te tapuhi te ewe ki te pouaka hei whakahoki mā ngā mātua ki te kāinga.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I mua i te tūmahi, e tohu ana i te whakahau. Whakamahia ai i ngā wāhi kotahi, e rua noa iho rānei ngā orokati noho tahi ki te oropuare poto, ngā oropuare poto anake rānei i roto i te tūmahi me ōna pūmuri (hāunga anō te 'rā').
tauira: Ka mea atu te pirihi ki te whakaminenga, 'E noho.'
Kia kaha, e kai.
E noho rā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kukū haere (o te kai e tunua ana).

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eneene', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakaohooho i te ngākau o tētahi atu me te whakahau i a ia kia mahi i tētahi mahi taikaha, tētahi mahi rānei e takahi ana i te ture.
tauira: Nā taua pōrangi rātou i eneene kia whiuwhiu pātara ki runga i te papa tākaro.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e\u0101', 'br.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu tū motuhake e whakaatu ana i te ohorere, i te mīharo.
tauira: Eā! Kua mate tāu mōkai

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehara', 'bran.whakam\u0101oritanga: Hei whakakāhore i ngā rerenga whakaingoa ka tīmata ki te 'he', ki te 'ko' rānei. Ka whai i muri mai ko te kupu 'i', ā, mēnā he 'he' te kupu tīmata, ka hurihia tērā ki te 'te'.
tauira: Ehara ia i te tangata matapiko - ahakoa tō hiahia, ka hoatu noa e ia.
Ehara tērā i te wahine hou a Tame - ko tana tuahine kē.
Ko ngā hīti tawhito kē ēnā, ehara i ngā mea hou.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: He huinga pūtau kōpae te hanga ka tipu i te kōpū o te whaea, o te whāereere, hei hono i ana toto ki ō te kukune, e whakawhitihia ai te hāora, te kai, me ngā para.
tauira: He hāwhe hāora pea i muri i te whānautanga mai o te pēpē, ka puta mai ko te ewe.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ene', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka kōrero ki tētahi atu i runga i te wairua whakamihi, whakangāwari, kia tutuki ai i a ia tētahi kaupapa e hiahia ana koe kia tutuki i a ia, mōu te painga.
tauira: Ahakoa pēhea tō ene mai i a au, e kore tonu au e whakaae ki tāu e inoi nā.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I ngā wāhi ko te kupu 'ai' e whai mai ana i te tūmahi, te tūāhua rānei, ā, koia te kupu tū i mua, e tohu ana i te take ka mahia tētahi mahi, i te hua rānei ka puta i tētahi mahi.
tauira: E mārama ake ai koe ki ēnei karakia, me pānui ngā whakamārama a Te Pēhi.
Me pēhea e pai ake ai taku reo Māori?

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka ara ake (o te whetū me te whetūao).
tauira: Ka eke te whetū o te ata

{'root_number':2, 'trunk':'ea', 'branch_.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka puta ake i te mata o te wai, ki runga ake i te wai rānei.
tauira: Kia timu te tai ka ea ai ngā toka ki runga
Ka roa ia i raro i te wai, kātahi anō tana upoko ka ea ake ki runga.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehara', 'bran.whakam\u0101oritanga: E whakaatu ana i eke tonu tā tētahi tangata i whakaaro ai ka eke, i hiahia ai, i whai ai rānei kia eke. Whakamahia ai hei whakaū, hei whakangahau i te kōrero.
tauira: Tahi anō whakarerenga iho o tana meremere; ehara, kua mate
Heoi, kua kore he kai . . . Kātahi tēnei ka karakia. Ehara, kua rere mai ngā ika ki roto i te waka

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ewe', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te wahine nāna i puta ai tētahi tamaiti ki te ao, nāna rānei ia i whakatipu.
tauira: Ko taku ewe, nō Tauranga, ko taku matua, nō Rēkohu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ero', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Tino kino te tūpuhi me te ngoikore anō.
tauira: Ero ana tana tinana, nā te kore kai.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehu', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kua kore e kōratarata (o te wai, o tētahi atu wē rānei), i te nui o ngā hanga ririki e tāiri ana i roto.
tauira: Kua ehu katoa te awa i te horomitanga whenua a te waipuke.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: I mua i tētahi tūmahi, tūāhua rānei kāore he pūmahi whai i muri mai, e tohu ana i tētahi mahi ka mahia, i tētahi āhuatanga rānei ka pā ā te wā e heke mai ana.
tauira: I tukuna te reta inanahi nei, tērā pea e tae atu āpōpō.
Makere te weka i te māhanga, e hoki anō?

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eweewerau', '.whakam\u0101oritanga: He wāhanga o te whenua ka puta i muri i te whānautanga o te pēpē.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekeeke', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi te tokorua i ētahi mahi kia tokomauri ai, pērā i te kuhu i te ure tū ki te tara, ka werowero ai ā tuhaina rawatia te tātea.
tauira: Ka tahuri te toa mā muri ekeeke ai i te uwha.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eke', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka haere whakarunga, tērā tonu ki te tihi o tētahi mea.
tauira: He pukepuke moana e ekeina e te waka

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehuehu', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi kia rere, kia marara ā-kōpata atu (tētahi momo wai) ki tētahi mea.
tauira: Ka ehuehungia atu he wai ki runga i te māra

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ehu', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka tātā (i te wai e noho mai ana i roto i te waka) ki te hoe kia puta atu ai te wai.
tauira: Ka ehua te wai o tōna waka

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113he', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu tū motuhake e whakaatu ana i te ohorere, i te mīharo.
tauira: Ēhe, koia ko tana tāne hōu? Te tamariki mārika!

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'eropereina',.whakam\u0101oritanga: He waka whai pūkaha, whai pākau ka rere i te rangi.
tauira: Me āta whakataki mārire te tīmatanga mai o tēnei waka whakamīharo, o te rererangi arā o te eropereina
Ka tuki te eropereina ki Maunga Erepahi - he aituā tino nui.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'\u0113', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kupu ka huaina i ngā mōteatea, i te mutunga o ētahi rārangi kōrero. Kāore ōna whakamārama tūturu, heoi anō pea tāna he whakaū i te tangi o te ngākau, he whai kia huatau te kupu.
tauira: Te marama i runga rā ē

{'root_number':4, 'trunk':'e', 'branch_n.whakam\u0101oritanga: He wā anō ka tū i mua i te tūwāhi koia te tāhū o te kōrero.
tauira: I mihi mai e waho, i riri mai e roto
E mua āta haere, e muri tātākino

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ekeeke', 'bra.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi te tokorua i ētahi mahi pērā i te kuhu atu i te ure tū ki te puta, e tokomauri ai te tangata.
tauira: E rua noa iho ngā hipi toa hei ekeeke i ngā uwha e rua rau - nā whai anō rāua i whīrokiroki ai!

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'ene', 'branch.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te wāhi o te tinana e puta ai ngā para mārō o te arakai.
